title: Process a Ticket Transfer
description: A ticket holder wants to transfer two of their four tickets to a friend.

tasks.description: Guide the customer to the 'Transfer Tickets' option in their online account or mobile app.
Instruct the customer to select the tickets they wish to transfer and enter their friend's email address.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer performs the action in the app.

tasks.description: The system sends an email to the friend to accept the ticket transfer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The transfer email is sent automatically.

tasks.description: Once the friend accepts, the system voids the original tickets and issues new ones to the recipient.
tasks.expected_outcome: The transfer is completed, and the tickets are moved to the new account.
